name: 酒店二 The Hotel 2
description:
A homeless man mistakenly entered a hotel that had been closed because of a terrorist incident. Then came a series of fantastic things.The measuring cup on the door, the confined girl, the young man and woman in a car accident.What will be the fate of the tramp waiting for him? Will he eventually be able to escape from the hotel?
Although this game is a terror decryption game, it has fewer frightening elements. Players can safely experience the whole game content. Auto-saving is set up in more important locations, avoiding the need to restart because of forgetting to save the game.
And this game contains certain action elements, as well as various games, players need to solve multiple puzzles, complete one challenge after another, to help the tramps find a way out.
Operating Method: Directional Key/Mouse Click to Control Person Moving
Enter key/Z key confirm
Esc/X key cancel
A key attack
Q key Setting Target
S key jump
